'''Valberries''' are a [[Local Specialty]] of [[Mondstadt]], found in the wild in [[Stormbearer Mountains]] and [[Stormbearer Point]].

==How to Obtain==
Valberries grow in groups of four berries on a single stem. They are found in the wild exclusively in [[Stormbearer Mountains]] and [[Stormbearer Point]].

See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=29 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
